transArray.content: The location of the hotel is very good, the front desk service is very enthusiastic, the service is very good, the front desk actively provides help, and the other staff are very enthusiastic. The check-in efficiency at the front desk is very fast. The other front desk staff are also very professional. The service is very patient and responsible. The check-in efficiency is very fast. The washing machine can also be dried very conveniently, and the check-out speed is also very fast. The front desk has a free luggage storage service, and also actively reminds that there is free coffee to drink. The overall service at the front desk is very enthusiastic. The room is very clean, the bathroom is also very clean, the towels and bath towels are soft and comfortable, the mattress is very comfortable, the bedding is very tidy overall, the toilet is very clean, the bathroom floor is cleaned very clean, the floor is clean, the room maid cleans it The hygiene will also take the initiative to say hello, and the lobby is also very clean, and the fragrance smells very good. The overall service is super good and I am the most satisfied. I highly recommend it. The check-in at CitiGO Huange Hotel in Sanlitun is very successful, recommended!
